summary: This mod replaces the Throw Voice Shout taunting with in-game animal sounds.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Nature\'s Lure - Throw Voice Shout[/b]

[youtube]av1_jduCS64[/youtube]

[u]Description[/u]:
This mod replaces the Throw Voice Shout taunts with in-game animal sounds. The original shout plays 6 different lines randomly, which are replaced by one of 2 main versions:

[u]Wild Beasts Version[/u]:
Replaces taunts with sounds of in-game wild creatures (wolf howl, troll combat roar, chaurus warning call and deer, bear and mammoth aggro warnings).

[u]Birds Version[/u]:
Replaces taunts with sounds of random in-game birds.

[u]Mute Races Add-on[/u]:
Some elven and beast races don\'t have audio files for the Throw Voice taunts. This mod is a replacer, so it can\'t replace files that don\'t exist. The Muted Raced Addon attempts to improve this by allowing said races to have a single custom sound (it\'s not much, but it\'s better than nothing), but it only works with the shout at full power, so it requires all 3 words to be unlocked. Oh, and despite being called an add-on, it doesn\'t require a main version to work.

[u]Requirements:[/u]
Skyrim updated to version 1.6.89.0.6 (if using the esp file).

The esp file is optional as it only disables the taunting subtitles; if you don\'t play with subtitles enabled, you don\'t need it at all.

[u]Install[/u]:

Copy or move the Data folder from this archive to your Skyrim root folder (delete the ThrowVoice_NoSubs.esp file if you don\'t need/want to use it).

[u]Uninstall[/u]:
Go to the following folders:
...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm\\femaleeventoned
...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm\\maleeventoned
...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm\\malekhajiit
...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm\\maleorc

and delete the following files:
\\voicepowers_throwvoiceline_000cedfe_1.fuz
\\voicepowers_throwvoiceline_000e0cb5_1.fuz
\\voicepowers_throwvoiceline_000e0cb6_1.fuz
\\voicepowers_throwvoiceline_000e0cb7_1.fuz
\\voicepowers_throwvoiceline_000e0cb8_1.fuz
\\voicepowers_throwvoiceline_000e0cb9_1.fuz

The Mute Races Add-on has its own instructions inside the archive.

[u]Tools used[/u]:
Unfuzer CPP Edition, by greentea101
BSA Browser, by Faw

Enjoy!
author: Krail3r
